description: Uburenganzira bw’umubyeyi utwite cyangwa ute uruhinja bukwiriye kuba-hirizwa aho akorera, bamurinda ihohoterwa iryo ari ryo ryose, agahabwa igihe cyo konsa n’igihe cy’ikiruhuko.
title: Uburenganzira bw’umubyeyi utwite cyangwa ute uruhinja bukwiriye kuba-hirizwa aho akorera, bamurinda ihohoterwa iryo ari ryo ryose, agahabwa igihe cyo konsa n’igihe cy’ikiruhuko.
content: Uburenganzira bw’umubyeyi utwite cyangwa ute uruhinja bukwiriye kuba-hirizwa aho akorera, bamurinda ihohoterwa iryo ari ryo ryose, agahabwa igihe cyo konsa n’igihe cy’ikiruhuko.
